couldnt this be summarized as:

item.source: Random Calculator By APS B>>>>>>>> FIRST SCRIPT

item.title: Random Calculator By APS B>>>>>>>> FIRST SCRIPT
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

Nice script, but theres one problem.

You have the if(IsFKeyDown… and thats good, but when the script starts, it doesn’t wait for the F Key to be pushed, it checks right away and only once. So the script will start and stop itself right away. To eliminate that, you just need to put a repeat Until(false); around it, and add the ‘break;’ command after then. So it would look something like this:

/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// /////--------------------Very Pointless Random Calculator /////// /////////////////////////////// By APS B //////////////////////// //remember the pikachu... <(^-_-^<) var a:integer; begin Repeat ////////click F9 to start the random calculator if(isfkeydown(9))then break; Until(false); repeat a:= 1+random(100); a:= a * 1; a:= a + 1; wait(100+random(250)); Writeln(IntToStr(a)); ////////click F12 to Emergancy stop, in case your hot keys dont work until(isfkeydown(12)); end.

Now it waits for the F9 key to be pushed. But thats just a minor glitch, good first script, keep it up.

-Weibs.

Read full topic

item.title: Random Calculator By APS B>>>>>>>> FIRST SCRIPT
item.dc:creator: @aps aps
item.description:
@aps wrote:

ok, my script is a calculator with no real point, just follow the green instructions and you should be fine… lol jk
F9 to start
F12 to stop
[glow=green,5,300]walla walla waffles[/glow]

[scar]///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
/////--------------------Very Pointless Random Calculator ///////
/////////////////////////////// By APS B ////////////////////////
//remember the pikachu… <(^-_-^<)
var a:integer;
begin
////////click F9 to start the random calculator
if(isfkeydown(9))then
begin
repeat
a:= 1+random(100);
a:= a * 1;
a:= a + 1;
wait(100+random(250));
Writeln(IntToStr(a));
////////click F12 to Emergancy stop, in case your hot keys dont work
until(isfkeydown(12));
end;
end.[/scar]

Read full topic
